long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Telegram Privacy Extension - Protect Your Conversations on Telegram Web

Enhance your privacy while using Telegram Web with the Telegram Privacy Extension. This extension ensures that your messages remain hidden until you decide to reveal them by hovering your cursor. Whether you're working in a shared space, at home, or on the go, this tool provides you with the peace of mind that your private conversations will stay private.

Key Features:

Message Hiding: Automatically blur your Telegram messages until you hover over them, ensuring that your conversations are only visible to you.
Easy Toggle: Quickly enable or disable the privacy feature directly from the extension’s popup menu, giving you full control over your privacy settings.
Seamless Integration: The extension works directly within Telegram Web, requiring no complicated setup or additional permissions.
Lightweight and Fast: Minimal impact on your browser performance, with no unnecessary permissions required.
Secure and Reliable: No data is stored or transmitted; your privacy is maintained at all times.
Why Use Telegram Privacy Extension? In today’s world, privacy is more important than ever. Whether you're in a public place, at work, or sharing a screen during a meeting, keeping your personal messages private is crucial. This extension adds a layer of security to your Telegram Web experience, ensuring that sensitive information is not exposed to unwanted viewers.

How It Works: Once installed, Telegram Privacy Extension automatically blurs your chat messages on Telegram Web. Hover your mouse over a message to reveal it temporarily, and it will automatically blur again when you move your cursor away. Use the Toggle button in the extension’s popup to quickly turn the feature on or off.

Perfect for:

Working professionals who use Telegram Web in office environments
Students and researchers working in shared spaces
Anyone who values their privacy while using Telegram Web
Take control of your online privacy with the Telegram Privacy Extension. Download now and start protecting your conversations today!
